title: HTTP code 302
body:
# Summary support redirects in downloading. i was trying to install llvm: ==> Installing llvm ==> Fetching file:///afs/slac/package/spack/var/spack/manual_mirrors/llvm/llvm-5.0.1.tar.xz curl: (37) Couldn't open file /afs/slac/package/spack/var/spack/manual_mirrors/llvm/llvm-5.0.1.tar.xz ==> Fetching from file:///afs/slac/package/spack/var/spack/manual_mirrors/llvm/llvm-5.0.1.tar.xz failed. ==> Fetching http://llvm.org/releases/5.0.1/llvm-5.0.1.src.tar.xz curl: (7) Failed connect to llvm.org:80; Connection timed out ==> Fetching from http://llvm.org/releases/5.0.1/llvm-5.0.1.src.tar.xz failed. ==> Can not find version 5.0.1 in url_list ==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for llvm-5.0.1-hetznfxw7bbbqwfnhgyhotqysga4qxmo FetchError: FetchError: All fetchers failed for llvm-5.0.1-hetznfxw7bbbqwfnhgyhotqysga4qxmo /afs/slac.stanford.edu/package/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:993, in do_fetch: 25 self.spec.format('$_$@'), ck_msg) 26 27 self.stage.create() >> 28 self.stage.fetch(mirror_only) 29 self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time 30 31 if spack.do_checksum and self.version in self.versions: # What you expected it seems like the url is a 302: $ curl http://llvm.org/releases/5.0.1/llvm-5.0.1.src.tar.xz 302 Found

Found

The document has moved here.

Apache/2.4.7 (Ubuntu) Server at llvm.org Port 80
so spack should follow the redirect and download from the new url. # What happened instead spack doesn't seem to follow redirects.
